price: 他们说：“你来阻止我们崇拜我们的众神灵吗？你昭示我们你所用以恫吓我们的刑罚吧！如果你是说实话的！”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā litafikanā ʿan ālihatinā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
